title: So why are the new HexTech Crates purchaseable, but can't be openned?
body:
So apparently the new Crates are out, except there's no tab where you can actually open them like you see in the PBE.

And it's strange how there's almost no announcement, they just show up.

So I bought a couple Crate+Key packs, but there's no way to open them...

...help?

Proof: http://i.imgur.com/aeKiE5R.png

replies.body: Lol the only bug threads they reply to are the ones involving them making more money.

Hey PixTron,

Sorry that you're unable to open your chests right now! First, try just restarting League of Legends. There should be a new button in between the store and summoner profile (looks like a diamond) next time you log in. Let me know if it's not there!
